detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and chest pocket with an interactive detail. Ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and chest pocket with an interactive detail. Ribbing around the neckline.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, patch front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with a moccasin seam at the front. Pile linings and insoles.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with a moccasin seam at the front. Pile linings and insoles.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with mesh at the back. Adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in a lightly brushed, fine knit. High waist with covered elastication and wide, gently flared legs.
Padded slippers in soft velour with an embroidered motif, bell and appliqués on the front. Velour linings and insoles and soles with anti-slip protectors.
Jeans in soft denim with a high paper bag waist that is elasticated at the back and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, front pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Slightly wider jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck. Relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves, high slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck. Relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves, high slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck and large buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck and large buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Rib-knit jumper in wool containing some cashmere. V-neck, extra-long, wide raglan sleeves, high slits in the sides and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Top in soft jersey made from merino wool with extra-long sleeves. Visible seams down the back and sleeves.

Wide cardigan knitted in soft cashmere with hole-knit details. Deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and a ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cardigan in a soft, sturdy wool blend containing some cashmere with low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Detachable tie belt to define the waist, and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with low dropped shoulders, wide, tapered sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with low dropped shoulders, wide, tapered sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumpsuit in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline, short, flounced sleeves, an elasticated waist with a decorative knot detail at the front and straight, ankle-length legs.

Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in stretch jersey with a sheen made from Eastman Naia™ cellulose acetate. Small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and a vertical seam for a draped effect front and back. Lined.

Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in stretch jersey with a sheen made from Eastman Naia™ cellulose acetate. Small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and a vertical seam for a draped effect front and back. Lined.
Calf-length slip dress in softly draping satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.

One-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a shoulder strap on one side and a long sleeve on the other.

Shaping briefs in jersey and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The briefs have a gentle sculpting effect on the waist.

Set with a sleeveless romper suit and T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Romper suit with press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.

Thong body in soft lace and mesh with a deep V-neck and open back with ties at the back of the neck. Mesh lining at the top, concealed elastication at the waist and a lined gusset.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers with straps in soft jersey. T-shirt with a ribbed neckline and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable buttoning. The cotton content of the set is organic.

Knee-length dress in soft, gently draping, patterned jersey with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist and a narrow, detachable tie belt with metal ends. Unlined.

Set with a skirt and top in soft, organic cotton jersey. Patterned top with short puff sleeves, a round neckline with a narrow trim, and a press-stud on one shoulder. Skirt with an elasticated waist, flounced tiers and sewn-in pants with elasticated hems.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Size from 1.5 cm to 3 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Size from 1.5 cm to 3 cm.
Metal earrings with a hanging hoop and a patterned plastic rod-shaped pendant at the bottom. Length 6 cm.
Nursing top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Wrapover front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Jumpsuit in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. V-neck front and back and a seam and drawstring under the bust. Short sleeves and tapered legs.

Knee-length dress in soft, extra-stretchy viscose jersey with smocking at the waist and long puff sleeves with gathers. Unlined.

Set with a bodysuit, T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. T-shirt with lapped shoulders. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a bodysuit, T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. T-shirt with lapped shoulders. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.

Fitted, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and concealed press-studs at the front. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, fitted coat in woven fabric with a brushed finish. Stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, a seam at the waist and side pockets with a concealed zip. Lined.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a detachable belt with a round metal buckle at the waist and no fasteners. Adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
